thread.title: Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 72 runs, seal 2-0 series win
thread.title_full: Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 72 runs, seal 2-0 series win - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 72 runs, seal 2-0 series win
text: 26 Oct 2015 Sri Lanka defeated the West Indies by 72 runs in the second Cricket Test today to sweep the series 2-0. At the P Sara Oval in Colombo, resuming on 20 for One, chasing a victory target of 244, the tourists were shot out for 171 in their second innings in the post-lunch session of the fifth day's play. Â»
